page.title: 03The Writing on the Wall
page.content: By our house there is a maisonette with graffiti all over the front door and under the window. It has "Munich '58" and "The Strand Rule O.K." written on it, and there are lots of people's names on it as well. They have sprayed paint all over the front door and they have smashed a bedroom window. Everyone says that drug addicts are moving into it. An old lady used to live there but she moved out because the boys used to torment her. Once they smashed her window and she telephoned the police. They came and caught two of them and took them to the old lady. She recognised them and they were taken to the police station. Three days later they went to court and their parents were made to pay for all the damage. Steven Howey
